column6: The Customer Service Representative sends a Mortgage offer to the customer and waits for a reply.
If the customer calls or writes back declining the mortgage, the case details are updated and the work is then archived prior to cancellation.
column10: the customer calls or writes back declining the mortgage

column6: If the customer sends back the completed offer documents and attaches all prerequisite documents then the case is moved to administration for completion.
column10: the customer sends back the completed offer documents and attaches all prerequisite documents

column6: If all pre-requisite documents are not provided a message is generated to the customer requesting outstanding documents.
column10: all pre-requisite documents are not provided

column6: If no answer is received after 2 weeks, the case details are updated prior to archive and cancellation.
column10: no answer is received after 2 weeks
